author: Greenville News, Zoe Nicholson, Greenville News
title: Despite coronavirus, college students threw party with 100 people. Police plan crack down.
description: After police officers broke up a party Friday night, Clemson is considering how to enforce coronavirus quarantine and social distancing guidelines.
content:
Practicing social distancing during coronavirus doesn't mean you have to give up TV watch parties with your friends thanks to Netflix Party.
USA TODAY
